data.title: Joe the cosmonaut
data.statement:
Joe is a cosmonaut, he wants to go to Mars
That's Joe:
```
       ,   Mars!
       \    /
        \0
         |\/
         |  
        / \   
       /   \
```

He doesn't have a rocket though. Poor Joe.
<<Build him a rocket given [[h]](height) [[w]](width)>>

Construction instruction:

- the cone always starts with width 2
- with each subsequent line 2 space characters are added until the width of the cone is [[w]]

- the body of the rocket has height [[h]] and width [[w]]
- left and right side of the body are represented by {{|}}

- flames (it works the same way as the cone, but it's mirrored) filled with {{X}} instead of space characters

The cone on the top and the fire at the bottom depend on the width and not the height (they should always cover the full body of the rocket)

data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> Two space-separated integers [[h]] and [[w]] for the height and width of the rocket respectively

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Joe is a cosmonaut, he wants to go to Mars
That's Joe:

       ,   Mars!
       \    /
        \0
         |\/
         |  
        / \   
       /   \


He doesn't have a rocket though. Poor Joe.
Build him a rocket given h(height) w(width)

Construction instruction:

- the cone always starts with width 2
- with each subsequent line 2 space characters are added until the width of the cone is w

- the body of the rocket has height h and width w
- left and right side of the body are represented by |

- flames (it works the same way as the cone, but it's mirrored) filled with X instead of space characters

The cone on the top and the fire at the bottom depend on the width and not the height (they should always cover the full body of the rocket)




   

      
Input

      
Line 1: Two space-separated integers h and w for the height and width of the rocket respectively

   

   

      
Output

      
ASCII art rocket

   

   

      
Constraints

      
0<h<56
0<w<56, w is always even

   

   

      
Example

      

         

            
Input

            
2 2

         

         

            
Output

            
 /\
/  \
|  |
|  |
XXXX
 XX
